title: Eurocrats never leave the EU gravy train — next thing you know I'll be saying delaying Brexit was a good idea all along
text:
In his EU diary, direct from the heart of Brussels, Brexit Party MEP John Longworth reflects on the absurdities of life in the European Parliament

Unlike the number 42 in The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy, for me the answer to the meaning of, in this case, life, liberty and everything is 31 - that is to say, the 31st of October, Brexit Day.

Assuming this would be my last visit to the EU Parliament in Strasbourg, I was gearing up to parrot that memorable scene from the series where the intelligent dolphins abandon Earth to escape its coming destruction, leaving the cheery message “so long and thanks for all the fish”.

Naturally, whether we get all the fish depends on the nature of our EU departure....
description: In his EU diary, direct from the heart of Brussels, Brexit Party MEP John Longworth reflects on the absurdities of life in the European Parliament
